snippet.title: Desert Kingdom opening
snippet.description:
http://otakuxgamer.com

HimeyaShop's description:

Aspasia is a princess of EVUU, a devil kingdom. One day, she suddenly can't use magic and asks her father. "Ah, because your deceased mother was a human being...." Yes, Aspasia is half devil and half human.... Her father tells her how to get back the power. It is to collect the power by making wishes of humans come true. After 2 months of wandering, she finally arrives at a country surrounded by desert. There are actually full of handsome men..., no, human beings full of desire....


Play-Asia's description:

Aspacia is the princess of Evuu. One day, the fifteen year old lost her magic. When she went to her father for answers, he told her it was because of her awakening human blood. To regain her powers, the princess has to travel to the human world and grant wishes, the more she does the faster she could go back to her pampered life in the palace.

After two months of traveling, she reached a desert kingdom filled with charming men and their desires. How you respond to them will be up to you, and who's wishes you grant first will affect your chances with the men.

Power and men, both are in your grasp.
